name: ssopab2i
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wss(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1))

stmt.origin: mpg(s0, wss(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1)), wal(s1, wi(w0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wss(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, w1))), wss(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1)))
-| wal(s1, wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, w1))), wss(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1)))
-| wal(s1, wi(w0, w1))

body.origin: |- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, w1))), wss(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1))
-| wal(s1, wi(w0, w1))

|- wss(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1))
-| wi(w0, w1)

comment: Inference of ordered pair abstraction subclass from implication. (Contributed by NM, 5-Apr-1995.)
